title: Blinkit Price Scraper
description: Scrape product prices, names, discounts, and availability from Blinkit grocery delivery service. Search for products by keyword.

search_query.title: Search Query
search_query.description: Product search keyword(s). Example: milk, vegetables, snacks

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of results
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of products to collect. Set to 0 for unlimited.

setGeolocation.title: Set geolocation
setGeolocation.description: If enabled, sets a fixed geolocation for the browser session (useful when Blinkit requires a delivery location).

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Latitude for geolocation (used only when Set geolocation is enabled).

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Longitude for geolocation (used only when Set geolocation is enabled).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for reliable scraping (Residential recommended for Blinkit).
